description: CRUD files and folders on the local file system.

file.descriptor: The path of the file or folder to operate on.

operation.valid-options: read | create | edit | move | delete | list-dir
operation.descriptor: The action to perform on the file or folder.

write-content.descriptor: Content to write into the file. Used with create or edit operations.

new-path.descriptor: New path for the file or folder when performing a move operation.
